subject: Dear Sir/Madam,
body:
Dear Sir/Madam,
We wish to inform you that your Compensation Funds have been approved
in your name by the new Elected President Federal Republic of Nigeria
Bola Ahmed Tinubu, Please you are advice to contact the payment
officer Dr. King Ibe for more details.
Thanks for your co-operation.
Dr. King Ibe
E-Mail: 
onotification@yandex.com
Telephone: +234-704-613-1333

subject: Re:  Dear Sir/Madam,
body:
Hello there,

Thank you so much for your message. It's quite exciting to hear about this approval from the new Elected President Federal Republic of Nigeria, Bola Ahmed Tinubu. I'm curious, how did this come about? 

I'd love to learn more about this process and what it entails. Could you please provide me with more details?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Edwin
